skills.name: Vital Parts Shelling (急所攻撃)
skills.text:
1. When [Main Battery Salvo] hits a target, 100% chance to lower target speed by 50% and disables the rudder. Lasts 10 seconds, does not stack.
2. Increases Crit Rate by 20%

skills.name: Aim Assist (標準補正)
skills.text: 1. During Battle, 40% to use T-Cross Advantage buff during [Main Battery Salvo]
